attributes.action: introduce a scheme that would ensure all UK citizens under the age of 18 must undertake 100 hours of voluntary work to qualify for any State benefits.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Programmes of community voluntary work could be substituted by under 18 year-olds taking up recognised youth development programmes such as the Duke of Edinburgh Award schemes. All under-18s would need to complete their 100 hours to qualify for any education grant or job seekers allowance. If the Government is to force everyone to stay in education or training until they are 18, then let us also allow society to get something productive back.
